description.value:
Special: Blast (5)

Note: No effect on those in environmentally sealed gear. Contains a drug or poison of choice that is applied to everyone in blast radius as a gas. Targets get +10 to tests to resist the effects of the gas (if no test by default, assume +0 Toughness Test).
